name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of experience in crafting high-performance applications utilizing **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, **Vue.js**, **HTML**, **CSS**, **Git**, **Webpack**, and **npm**. Proficient in building scalable solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging both **AI** and advanced web technologies. My strong command of **React**, **Next.js**, and **Python** unites with deep cloud proficiency in **Azure** and **AWS** to deliver innovative, enterprise-grade platforms.

I excel in microservices architecture, event-driven design, and CI/CD automation, ensuring robust, secure applications that comply with regulatory standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I also possess hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, enhancing operational efficiency and enabling predictive analytics. My approach merges technical expertise with a dedication to developing high-quality software solutions.

• Conducted performance optimization assessments for high-traffic web applications, leveraging **npm** and **PostCSS** to ensure efficient loading times and smooth user interactions, improving page load speed by **50%**.
• Collaborated cross-functionally with design teams to implement user-centered design principles for web applications, resulting in higher user satisfaction scores and a drop in bounce rates by **15%**.
• Employed state management solutions to enhance application performance, facilitating better data flow across components and enriching the user experience through faster data retrieval and rendering.
• Participated in code reviews and development sprints, adhering to best practices in software development, enabling a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing within the team.
• Mentored junior developers on core technologies and best practices, enhancing overall team capability and promoting a collaborative learning environment.

- Spearheaded the development of modern financial platforms, leveraging **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) to enhance system scalability and maintainability for high-volume transactions, achieving a throughput increase of **30%**.

- Developed and deployed real-time transaction monitoring dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and Power BI Embedded, providing operations teams with the ability to track and analyze financial data efficiently and detect anomalies, resulting in a **40%** reduction in incident response time.

• Developed full-stack applications utilizing **Node.js** for backend and **VueJS** for frontend, ensuring robust, high-performance functionalities across various platforms.
• Implemented responsive web design principles using **HTML5**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, elevating user experiences across mobile and desktop devices while adhering to accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
• Executed version control and collaborative development processes using **Git**, resulting in a **20%** increase in team delivery efficiency through improved code management.
• Created modular and maintainable code with build tools like **Webpack** and task runners such as **npm**, facilitating a streamlined development pipeline.
• Designed and maintained API services that efficiently integrate with payment gateways including **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, achieving a **99.9%** transaction success rate.
• Employed testing frameworks such as **Mocha** and **Jest** for quality assurance, achieving over **85%** code coverage and reducing bugs in production.
• Leveraged modern CSS technologies, including **SASS** and **PostCSS**, to maintain scalable and organized stylesheets for growing applications.
• Contributed to continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes, optimizing build and deployment times by **30%** through automated scripts.
• Integrated machine learning models using **AI** technologies to enhance user personalization features, driving a **15%** increase in customer engagement metrics.
